article.title: Northrop Grumman to Provide Joint Tactical Common Operation Picture Software
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Defense Systems Division, Herndon, Virginia, is being awarded a $5 million contract modification to provide post delivery software support for joint tactical common operation picture workstation client and gateway software.Â The Marine Corps Systems Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
